mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO config_info ( id, data_id, group_id, content, md5, gmt_create, gmt_modified, src_user, src_ip, app_name, tenant_id, c_desc, c_use, effect, type, c_schema ) VALUES
( #{record.id}, #{record.dataId}, #{record.groupId}, #{record.content}, #{record.md5}, #{record.gmtCreate}, #{record.gmtModified}, #{record.srcUser}, #{record.srcIp}, #{record.appName}, #{record.tenantId}, #{record.cDesc}, #{record.cUse}, #{record.effect}, #{record.type}, #{record.cSchema} )
